playground.copyManually:
Automatic copying failed. 
Please manually select the text and use Ctrl C (Mac: Cmd C) to copy

error.chatFailed: Interface exception, please try again later

message.systemDefaultContent: You are 302 AI assistant, good at solving user problems.

settings.apiKeyDesc: You can get your API key from [302AI](https://dash.302.ai/apis/list). The API key is used to access AI models, please keep it safe.
settings.beginnerModeDesc: Simple UI interface with advanced features hidden, making it easy for beginners to get started. Supports basic conversation functionality.
settings.expertModeDesc: Unlocks all advanced features, allowing users to freely arrange each message, supporting message editing, deletion, drag-and-drop sorting, and more.
settings.expertModeDeviceNote: Professional mode is recommended to be used on the computer. The mobile version may affect the operating experience of some functions.
settings.frequencyPenaltyDesc: Frequency penalty setting. It affects the likelihood of the model to repeatedly use the same words or phrases. The value is passed through to the provider. The range depends on the provider and model.
settings.languageTooltip: Select interface language. After changing the language, all interface text will be displayed in the selected language.
settings.maxTokensDesc: The maximum number of tokens allowed for model responses. Adjust this setting to control the length of the generated responses.
settings.modelDesc: Model selection. Note: The token probability display feature only supports certain OpenAI models (such as GPT-4o).
settings.presencePenaltyDesc: Presence penalty setting. It affects the likelihood of the model to repeat information that is already in the prompt. The value is passed through to the provider. The range depends on the provider and model.
settings.resetSettingsDesc: Restore all settings to default values (except model settings)
settings.temperatureDesc: Temperature setting. The value is passed through to the provider. The range depends on the provider and model. It is recommended to set either temperature or topP, but not both.
settings.title: Settings
settings.topPDesc: Nucleus sampling. The value is passed through to the provider. The range depends on the provider and model. It is recommended to set either temperature or topP, but not both.
